name: Geodesy
description: Measurement and representation of the Earth.

name: Round
description: Surrounded by a circular ice barrier.

name: Cosmology
description: Study of the overall form of the Universe.

name: Geocentric
description: The planets and stars circle the Earth.

name: Heliocentric
description: The planets and stars circle the Sun.

name: Tychonic
description: The best features of geocentric and heliocentric systems combined.

name: Acentric
description: Belief that the Universe has no defined center.
